panel-0.title: Entrance Hall
panel-0.content:
The grand entrance hall of the museum is filled with visitors. The detective stands near the information desk, observing the flow of people. It's the perfect place to start the investigation.

Two guards are discussing the recent thefts, providing a potential lead.

panel-1.title: Guards' Station
panel-1.content:
The guards explain that several items have been stolen from the museum recently. They mention a suspicious person seen near the modern art exhibit.

One guard recalls seeing this person carrying a peculiar bag.

panel-2.title: Exhibition Room
panel-2.content:
The exhibition room is filled with various artworks. The detective notices a peculiar painting that seems out of place. Upon closer inspection, there are signs of tampering around its frame.

A nearby visitor mentions seeing someone tampering with the painting last night.

panel-3.title: Tampered Painting
panel-3.content:
The painting has a hidden compartment behind it. Inside, the detective finds a small notebook containing coded messages and a list of items that were stolen.

This notebook could be a crucial piece of evidence.

panel-4.title: Deciphering Room
panel-4.content:
In a quiet room, the detective deciphers the messages in the notebook. They reveal details about the thefts and mention a rendezvous point for the thief near the museum's loading dock.

Itâ€™s time to head to the loading dock for further investigation.

panel-5.title: Loading Dock
panel-5.content:
The loading dock is quiet and deserted. However, the detective finds traces of mud and a scrap of fabric matching the description given by the guards.

This must be where the thief made their escape. The final piece of evidence is found here, leading to the case's resolution.

fact-1.title: Guard Testimony
fact-1.description: The guards saw a suspicious person near the modern art exhibit.

fact-2.title: Visitor Testimony
fact-2.description: A visitor saw someone tampering with a painting last night.

fact-3.title: Notebook
fact-3.description: A notebook with coded messages and a list of stolen items.

fact-4.title: Decoded Messages
fact-4.description: Messages reveal details about the thefts and a rendezvous point.

fact-5.title: Mud and Fabric
fact-5.description: Traces of mud and a scrap of fabric found at the loading dock.

fact-6.title: Thief's Escape Route
fact-6.description: The thief used the loading dock as an escape route.

fact-7.title: Thief's Identity
fact-7.description: The identity of the thief is deduced from the escape route and testimonies.
